EmailTemplate.name: 08_08_2014 VMW Europe Launch.Email_use
EmailTemplate.subject: {{lead.First Name:default=Enter &}}: Win 2 Passes to VMworld Europe | 3 Chances to Win
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Enter For Your Chance to Win 2 Passes to VMworld Europe Drawings on August 22, August 29, & September 9 Enter to Win 2 Full Passes to VMworld® Europe! <http://vmturbo.com/vmturbo-vmworld-europe-sweepstakes?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=EUsweeps> Every Friday in June, we gave away two full conference passes to VMworld® U.S. You didn’t think we’d stop there, did you?
Our VMworld Europe Sweepstakes is a continuation of tradition: getting as many people to VMworld as we can. We’re leading the virtual revolution from the spindles of your on-prem datastores to the beefiest VM you’ve provisioned in the Amazon cloud. Why should we limit the boundaries of our virtual love? Enter today. <http://vmturbo.com/vmturbo-vmworld-europe-sweepstakes?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=EUsweeps> Return for winner listings every Friday: August 22, 29, & September 5. See you in Barca.
Please see Official Rules <http://go.vmturbo.com/vmturbo-vmworld-europe-sweepstakes-rules.html>. We have included as many countries as legally possible. Enter to Win <http://vmturbo.com/vmturbo-vmworld-europe-sweepstakes?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=EUsweeps> 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
